title: Rajputana Ruby Polki Peacock Chandbali Earrings
materials: Natural Pearls. Handcrafted with the renowned Hyderabadi polish for an everlasting luster.
features: A stunning pair of Chandbali earrings featuring a traditional peacock motif rendered in intricate detail with uncut polki diamonds. The centerpiece is adorned with rich ruby cabochons, complemented by delicate pearls. The design elegantly blends vintage charm with contemporary aesthetics, reflecting the royal Rajputana styles.
colors: The earrings feature a vibrant color palette with the deep red of the rubies contrasted by the sparkle of the polki diamonds. The gold accents adds warmth and the pearls offer a touch of delicate radiance.
occasions: Ideal for special occasions like weddings (Veedhulu)
and grand celebrations. Suitable for both traditional attire and fusion outfits.
description: These Chandbali earrings are a testament to exquisite craftsmanship and timeless design. The use of high-quality materials ensures durability and lasting beauty. They are a perfect blend of tradition and modernity, making them a versatile addition to any jewelry collection. The use of natural stones adds value and uniqueness.
